content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2019 Fiesta Bowl Packages

Wrap up the year with some of the finest college football the sport has to offer. Roadtrips’ 2019 Fiesta Bowl packages are fully customizable so you can create your ideal football experience. Choose from great accommodations in Glendale, your preferred tickets, and a number of other extras that can be added to enhance your experience. This annual contest features some of the most talented athletes to fill the ranks of the elite collegiate teams. Always a thrilling game, this year the stakes are even higher with a spot in the College Football Championship on the line. Complete 2019 Fiesta Bowl packages available from $1,135 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2019 Fiesta Bowl

The Fiesta Bowl has taken place annually in the Phoenix area since 1971. Each year, tens of thousands of fans take in the game, enjoying some of Arizona’s temperate weather in the process. This year, the Fiesta Bowl will take place on December 28, 2019 at the newly renamed State Farm Stadium in Glendale (formerly University of Phoenix Stadium), and will serve as one of the semifinal games for the College Football Championship.
